pageContext.claim: “Turkey fully understands not to fire on the Kurds as they leave what will be known as the Safe Zone for other fairly nearby areas. I don't have to repeat that large scale Sanctions will be imposed for violations. Going well! ISIS secured by Kurds with Turkey ready as backup.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump suggests the sanctions that he had imposed on Turkey were "large scale," but in the initial round of sanctions, Trump failed to target some of Turkey’s most valuable resources. The Washington Post reported the sanctions are “mostly bluster,” according to economist Jacob Funk Kirkegaard of the Peterson Institute for International Economics.
